data.title: Security
data.text:
If you are a journalist or a customer, who are looking to get in touch, please refer to the information available here.

In our opinion, the practice of responsible disclosure is the best way to safeguard the security of all parties involved. In the case of a security issue, responsible disclosure would help us, by allowing us to address the root cause quickly with fixes, before any potential abuse would occur.

If you discover any security flaws in regards to our SDKs, web services or similar we would love to discuss it with you! But please note that we explicitly ask you not to do the following:

Do not perform DoS or DDoS attacks

Do not run automated scans or attacks against us, without prior approval

Do not attempt social engineering techniques (phishing, vishing, etc.)

In any way attack our end users, or engage in trading stolen or secret information or credentials
